game.name: Metrocity - Discovery Town
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play Metrocity, a challenging and innovative city builder game. prove your ability to organize and create the best city in the world. develop your city from 0 to thousands of people only in this game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play Metrocity, a challenging and innovative city builder game. prove your ability to organize and create the best city in the world. develop your city from 0 to thousands of people only in this game.
